original_text: But, if she did not do those wrong things, the water will not hurt her. She will be able to have babies.
korean_text: 그러나 여인이 더럽힌 일이 없고 정결하면 해를 받지 않고 임신하리라

sentences.original_text: But, if she did not do those wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그녀가 그 잘못된 행동을 하지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: the water will not hurt her
She will be able to have babies
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 아이를 가질 수 있을 것이다
